name: They Came From Outer Bass
description:
The aliens from outer bass have come for the music!  Help them jam out to the jams in this jam game made for the music mini jam!

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Space or Left Mouse Button to flip gravity
  • R to restart

Updates! :

  • Level select screen improved
  • added spinning lights to ship which indicate when gravity flip can be used
  • bug fixes -still polishing the ship/alien collisions but getting stuck is far less likely now
  • added fullscreen toggle to windows version

Art, music and programming by Chase of Bass
